term.title: electroneutrality principle

item.text: The principle expresses the fact that all pure substances carry a net charge of zero.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 1077. 'Glossary of terms used in physical organic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 1111 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466051077)
